text: Loek Cohen (born 4 March 1946) is a Dutch former professional footballer who played in the Eredivisie for USV Elinkwijk. Cohen, a forward, was also on the books of Ajax and of Amsterdam club ASV Arsenal ]. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Dutch footballers Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:AFC Ajax players Category:USV Elinkwijk players Category:Eredivisie players
title: Loek Cohen
